service_name: Xage Security OT Secure Remote Access

milestones.name: Deployment Planning & Pilot Implementation
milestones.description: Plan the rollout and deploy Xage Secure Remote Access in a pilot environment (one manufacturing site) to validate connectivity and performance in the OT setting.
milestones.outcome: Xage remote access operational in pilot plant; initial issues identified and addressed before company-wide rollout.

milestones.name: Staff Training & Policy Development
milestones.description: Conduct training sessions for IT and OT teams on using Xage SRA and collaboratively develop initial access policies tailored to GMI's OT environment.
milestones.outcome: All relevant staff are proficient with the new system; baseline zero trust access policies defined and ready for enforcement.

milestones.name: Enterprise-wide Rollout
milestones.description: Extend deployment to all GMI manufacturing sites, on-board all facilities onto the Xage SRA platform and enforce use of the new remote access solution.
milestones.outcome: Secure remote access available across all plants; legacy VPN or ad-hoc access methods phased out, achieving consistent security controls enterprise-wide.

milestones.name: Identity & MFA Integration
milestones.description: Integrate Xage SRA with corporate identity providers (e.g., Active Directory) and enable multi-factor authentication for all OT remote access sessions.
milestones.outcome: Unified identity management for OT access achieved; all remote sessions require MFA, significantly reducing risk of credential compromise.

milestones.name: Enable Advanced Security Features
milestones.description: Activate additional Xage features such as device posture checks, automated session termination on anomalies, and route OT access logs to the SIEM.
milestones.outcome: Improved security oversight and control: only compliant devices sustain access; suspicious sessions are automatically flagged or terminated; full visibility of OT remote access in the SOC.

milestones.name: Incident Response Drill
milestones.description: Conduct a simulated cyber incident (e.g., a compromised vendor account) to test incident response and the effectiveness of Xage controls in containing threats.
milestones.outcome: Response procedures validated in a realistic scenario; any gaps in Xage policy configuration or incident handling are identified and remediated.

milestones.name: Security Audit & Compliance Review
milestones.description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the Xage SRA deployment and ensure compliance with GMI's internal standards and industry frameworks (ISO 27001, IEC 62443).
milestones.outcome: Audit confirms significant risk reduction and compliance; findings provide actionable improvements, if any, to further enhance the security posture.

milestones.name: Maturity Assessment & Future Roadmap
milestones.description: Evaluate the organization's OT security maturity after deploying Xage SRA for two years and define next steps (e.g., adopting additional Xage capabilities or other security controls).
milestones.outcome: Maturity level meets or exceeds target; a new roadmap is developed for continuous improvement (such as extending zero trust to new facilities or integrating OT anomaly detection).

maturity_assessment.framework: Internal 1-5 maturity scale (5 = highest) aligned to GMI's OT security program

conditional_recommendations.trigger: Multiple unauthorized access attempts or policy denials detected in remote access logs
conditional_recommendations.recommendation: Conduct a targeted review of user access privileges and provide additional training on the remote access policies
conditional_recommendations.rationale: Frequent unauthorized attempts may indicate either malicious activity or user misunderstanding; tightening access rights or improving user knowledge can preempt potential breaches.

conditional_recommendations.trigger: A critical new OT security threat or vulnerability (e.g., ICS-specific malware) emerges
conditional_recommendations.recommendation: Initiate an immediate security review and update Xage policies or apply patches to address the threat
conditional_recommendations.rationale: Rapidly addressing emerging threats ensures that the remote access infrastructure remains secure against the latest attack vectors.
